Apollo

Created over 24 hours at a travel themed hackathon, Apollo is an AI based travel bot which significantly simplifies the entire travel experience.
Apollo won the first prize at said hackathon.

While the travel experience has been improved considerably and continuously through innovative solutions like AirBNB and TripAdvisor, I wanted to build something that would provide a one-stop, end-to-end integrated solution to streamline the travel booking process.

The result, Apollo, handles everything from helping you decide your destination, booking flight tickets and making hotel reservations, and suggesting a personalised travel itinerary.

Apollo was featured in an article in the Times of India, available here.

Role

{{role}}

The conversation starts with a simple question: Where do you want to go today?
Apollo then analyzes the response and filters the destination, number of passengers, and trip duration.

After confirming the data analyzed in the previous step, Apollo asks for a budget estimate, using it to stitch together an optimised travel plan, and selecting the best suited flight tickets available.

Keeping in mind the budget entered, Apollo then looks for the best hotels within your reach, using the TripAdvisor API to fetch hotel data.

Apolloo is smart enough to deal with negative responses. In this case, it fetches hotels in a lower price bracket, providing the most affordable options available.

Using Uber integration, Apollo then books a cab to take the user from his/her residence to the airport, keeping in mind the flight timings.

Lastly, Apollo signs off by looking up the local safety and emergency contacts and providing them to the user.
